allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add per-period class attendance with session tracking

Database Changes:
- add_period_to_class_attendance.sql: Add period column to class_attendance
  table, allowing separate attendance records for each class period
- add_attendance_sessions.sql: New class_attendance_sessions table to track
  when attendance was taken or class was canceled

Attendance Session System:
- Sessions track whether attendance was taken (completed) or class canceled
- If no session exists, students are NOT penalized (teacher didn''t take attendance)
- Canceled classes show reason and don''t count against students

UI Changes:
- Period selector dropdown when class meets multiple times per day
- Status banners: "Attendance Not Yet Taken" (yellow), "Attendance Recorded"
  (green), "Class Canceled" (red)
- Cancel Class button with optional reason input
- Restore Class button to uncancel
- Modal title shows current period

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add attendance reports section with statistics and filtering

Admin Attendance Reports:
- New Attendance Reports card in Admin Dashboard
- Dedicated admin section for viewing attendance data

Search Filters:
- Date range picker (defaults to last 30 days)
- Filter by student, class, status
- Toggle between class and daily attendance
- Export to CSV functionality

Statistics Dashboard:
- Overall stats: Present, Absent, Late, Left Early counts with percentages
- Visual attendance rate bar (color-coded by performance)
- Breakdown by class with individual attendance rates
- Breakdown by student with per-student stats table

Records Table:
- Sortable list of all matching attendance records
- Shows date, student, grade, class, period, status, notes

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add student contact info, emergency contacts, and medical info for teachers

Database Migrations:
- add_contact_fields.sql: Add phone and address fields to user_profiles
- emergency_contacts_table.sql: New table for student emergency contacts
  with RLS policies for admin, teacher, parent, and student access
- student_medical_info_table.sql: New table for medical conditions,
  allergies, medications, and emergency instructions

Portal Changes:
- Add "My Students" nav item for teachers
- New my-students-section with searchable student directory
- Student details modal shows:
  - Student info (name, grade, email, phone, address)
  - Parent/guardian info from parent_child_links
  - Emergency contacts with primary contact highlighted
  - Medical information (conditions, allergies, medications,
    dietary restrictions, physical limitations, emergency instructions)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Admin Student Records section for managing student info

New Features:
- Student Records card in Admin Dashboard
- Admin section with searchable/filterable student list
- Edit Student Records modal with tabbed interface:
  - Contact Info tab: Phone, address fields (editable)
  - Emergency Contacts tab: Add/edit/delete contacts with
    primary designation, relationship, phone, can-pickup flag
  - Medical Info tab: Conditions, allergies, medications,
    dietary restrictions, emergency instructions, doctor info

Functions added:
- renderAdminStudentRecords() - main section renderer
- renderAdminStudentRecordsTable() - student list table
- filterAdminStudentRecords() - search/grade filtering
- showAdminStudentRecordModal() - modal launcher
- loadAdminStudentRecord() - load student data
- renderAdminStudentRecordForm() - tabbed form UI
- switchStudentRecordTab() - tab navigation
- renderEmergencyContactCard() - contact card display
- addEmergencyContactForm() - new contact form
- saveNewEmergencyContact() - insert new contact
- editEmergencyContact() - inline edit form
- updateEmergencyContact() - update existing contact
- deleteEmergencyContact() - remove contact
- saveStudentContactInfo() - save profile contact fields
- saveStudentMedicalInfo() - upsert medical info

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add debug logging for assignment description quotes issue

Added console.log to track description HTML from Quill editor
when creating assignments to diagnose quote stripping issue.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix quotes being stripped from assignment title in edit modal

The issue was that quotes in assignment titles would break the HTML
when inserted into the value attribute of the input field:
  value="$assignment.title" -> value="Say "Hello""

This caused everything after the first quote to be cut off.

Fix: Escape double quotes as " before inserting into HTML attribute.
Also removed debug logging from previous commit.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add student strike system with decay and email notifications

Database:
- New student_strikes table with RLS policies for admin, teacher,
  parent, and student access

Admin Features:
- Student Strikes card in Admin Dashboard
- Dedicated strikes management section with search/filter
- Flagged students section (3 strikes) highlighted for review
- Issue strike modal with warning about current count
- Block issuing if already at max (3 strikes)
- View/manage strikes modal with decay dates
- Delete strike capability

Strike Decay:
- Max 3 strikes per student
- Strikes automatically decay 3 months from most recent strike
- Decay calculated on read, deleted when expired
- Decay dates shown in all views

Student View:
- Strike count in "Your Overview" section (color-coded)

Parent View:
- Strike count badge on each child in list
- Full strikes section in child details modal
- Shows all strikes with dates, reasons, decay info

Email Notifications:
- Parents notified via email for every strike
- Professional template with strike count and reason
- Special warning when max strikes reached

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add internal notifications for teachers on student strikes

- Teachers now receive in-app notifications when a student in their
  class receives a strike (instead of email)
- Parents still receive email notifications as before
- Removed unused teacher email template from edge function

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add password change feature to Profile Settings

- New Change Password card in Profile tab
- Two password fields that must match before submission
- Validates minimum 6 character password length
- Uses Supabase auth.updateUser() for authenticated password change
- Shows success/error notifications
- Clears form on successful update

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix student strikes query - fetch issuer profiles separately

The issued_by FK references auth.users, not user_profiles, so the
Supabase join syntax failed with 400 error. Now fetches issuer
profiles in a separate query and maps them to strikes.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign My Students details modal and add strikes display

Layout Changes:
- All sections now vertically stacked for cleaner appearance
- Consistent header styling with border separators
- More compact info display with smaller fonts

Add Note Dropdown:

Strikes Section (new):

Section Order:

EOF
)")

late_left_early statuses now count towards the overall attendance
rate in admin reports, along with present and late.

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add CSV import tool for student records

Database Migrations:
- add_date_of_birth.sql: Add date_of_birth column to user_profiles
- student_waivers_table.sql: New table for waiver/consent form tracking
  (insurance, media_release, waiver_liability, emergency_medical_auth)
  with RLS policies for admin, teacher, parent, and student access

CSV Import Feature (Admin Student Records):
- Import from CSV button in Student Records section
- CSV parser handles quoted fields, newline-separated values in cells
- Student matching by exact first + last name (case-insensitive)
- Preview screen with match summary and status icons
- Imports: home address, DOB, emergency contacts, medical info, waivers
- Results summary showing success, failures, and unmatched students

Student Record Edit Modal Updates:
- New Waivers tab with checkbox form for all 4 waiver types
- Date of Birth field added to Contact Info tab
- saveStudentWaivers() and updated saveStudentContactInfo() functions

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\JP_PC\Documents\Projects\student-portal" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix CSV parser to handle multi-line quoted fields

The previous parser split by newlines first, which broke cells containing
embedded newlines (like contact lists). The new parser processes the entire
file character-by-character, properly handling:
- Quoted fields spanning multiple lines
- Escaped quotes ("") within fields
- Windows (CRLF) and Unix (LF) line endings
- Section headers without last names (skipped)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
